documents_dashboard_explanation: Additional documents are required to verify your identity. You will find the list of supporting documents to send us below.
documents_dashboard_legal_text: OVH S.A.S as a controller processes the personal data collected via this form for the purposes of carrying out the pre-contractual measures necessary for identity verification checks, fraud detection and prevention. To find out more about your rights and how your data is processed of your personal data, please refer to our Policy on the Use of Personal Data.
documents_dashboard_individual_requireme: If you are an individual, the mandatory documents to provide are:
documents_dashboard_corporation_requirem: If you are a company, the mandatory documents to provide are:
documents_dashboard_administration_requi: If you are a public authority, the mandatory documents to provide are:
documents_dashboard_association_requirem: If you are a non-profit/organisation, the mandatory documents to provide are:
documents_dashboard_other_requirement: the mandatory documents to provide are:
documents_dashboard_submit_error_message: Your documents were not sent correctly. Please re-upload your documents.
documents_dashboard_submit_success_title: Thank you, we have received your documents!
documents_dashboard_submit_success_messa: We have received all of your documents. They will be submitted to our teams for validation. You will be notified of their validation by email, or you will be contacted if we need further information.
document_dashboard_open_banner_text: Your documents are currently being processed by our team. For more information, please refer to
documents_dashboard_form_requirement: Supported formats: {{accept}}. File size limit {{maximum_size}} MB. Maximum number of documents: {{maximum_documents}}
documents_dashboard_modal_header: Have you added all of the requested documents?
documents_dashboard_too_much_documents_e: The maximum number of documents supported is {{maximum}}
